body.p:
I received the "November Boughs" and like the general get up of the book much. It was a first, writing , + one wonders what it contains, good—good! The most I have had time for yet is the Hicks article. I think you have done good
work for the long , It is , inspiring, picture-like. It the all book bins of Richmond mine was so clear listed, I shared verdict that they would buy copies of the book by the scribe, but my experience with them was that they titled after the list of things that enclosed them support, harcumvdashy, to the foot. Blake is very much pleasure after the book, while I explain give it a givrescinptom in their clirty.
I hear by Donner that you are moderately on finished + traveling on as your wife instructs. Do you sense that is about the summing up for us all—moderatly, +c, +c.

I am doing fairly well—am getting where I pass experience my, with my eutrilamints. A healthy life of culture by chance came upon my evergs at
B.'s church, + was
